title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, deleting this image file from the outline image, and renaming 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg', the image is not refreshed and is still displayed as the old 'image1.jpg'.
EB: The image should be refreshed and displayed as the new 'image1.jpg' after importing it again.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 2. Delete this image file from the outline image. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
